The forcing meteorological data came from meteorological stations, daily precipitation data for 1951‒2007 (with a spatial resolution of 0.25° × 0.25°) from APHRODITE
32 , and daily maximum and minimum temperatures for 1948–2008 (with 0.5° × 0.5° spatial resolution) from PGMFD
33 . Post-processing of these data sets is described in the Supplementary Information.
